paper_title.ja: 山中地溝帯東域の下部白亜系から産出したテチス型動物群の発見とその意義
paper_title.en: Discovery of the Tethyan fauna from the Lower Cretaceous in the eastern part of the Sanchu Graben, Kanto Mountains, and its significance

description.ja: 山中地溝帯の下部白亜系は,従来,岩相や産出化石よりテチス北方型動物群を産する四国の物部川層群に対比されてきた.今回,その東域の中ノ沢および日向沢から見い出した二枚貝化石群集は,これまで報告されていたテチス北方型動物群とは異なり,それらの群集構成はアルビアンのテチス型動物群(熊本県の八代層産の動物群に代表される)とほぼ一致する.それらは山中地溝帯下部白亜系のテチス北方型動物群とは,汎世界的な種を除き,共通する種はほとんど見られない.したがって,山中地溝帯東域の下部白亜系にはテチス北方型動物群を産する下部白亜系に加え,新たにテチス型動物群を産するアルビアンの地層の存在が明らかになった.さらにこのテチス型動物群を産する地層は,西南日本の相当層などとの比較・検討から,武井(1964)が報告したTnoceramus cf hobetsensisを産する上位層との関連性が高いことが示唆される.
description.en: The Lower Cretaceous strata exposed in the Sanchu Graben in the Kanto Mountains have been correlated with the Monobe-gawa Group in Shikoku on the basis of fossil evidence. It is well-known that they yield the bivalve assemblage which is called the Northern-Tethyan fauna. Recently, we obtained the abundant bivalve fossils from Nakanosawa and Hinatazawa at the eastern part of the Sanchu graben. These assemblages bear a close resemblance to the Tethyan fauna in Albian Age. On the other hand, they show little affinity to the Northern-tethyan fauna which was previously reported from the Sanchu Graben. Those lines of fossil evidence suggest that the Cretaceous System of the Sanchu Graben yields not only the Northern-tethyan fauna but also the Tethyan fauna in Albian Age. In addition, Inoceramus cf. hobetsensis was reported from Numa-sato located to southeast of Hinatazawa. The strata yielding Inoceramus hobetsensis (Turonian species) probably overlie those yielding the Albian Tethyan fauna.

publication_name.en: Journal of the Geological Society of Japan

paper_title.ja: 日本列島のペルム紀?白亜紀砂岩の改訂BI図と後背地の造構場
paper_title.en: Revised BI diagram and provenance types of the Permian-Cretaceous sandstones in the Japanese Islands

description.ja: 砂岩の改訂版BI(Basicity Index) ダイアグラムと構成物の特徴に基づき, 日本列島のペルム紀～白亜紀供給源の発達過程や主要な地質区間の組成的関連を検討した.南部北上帯や舞鶴帯, 秩父累帯のペルム紀～ジュラ紀砂岩は, BIダイアグラム上でIIA(immature island arc) 領域からEIA(evolved island arc)領域をへて, CA (continental arc) & DA(dissected arc)領域へと変化する.砂岩構成物の特徴も考慮すると, この変化は, 未発達な島弧から, 花崗岩を伴ったより発達した島弧をへて, 花崗岩と高度変成岩から構成される後背地へ変化したことを示している.これは, これらの地質区のペルム系～ジュラ系が同じような後背地を有していたことを暗示している.秋吉帯や飛騨外縁帯のペルム系および北部北上帯のジュラ系などのデータもこの結論と調和的である.白亜紀初期に後背地は, 安山岩質～石英安山岩質の火山岩に覆われた.
description.en: On the basis of revised BI (Basicity Index) diagram [Al_2O_3/SiO_2-(TFeO+MgO)/(SiO_2+K_2O+Na_2O)] and modal compositions of sandstones from the Permian to Cretaceous in the Japanese Islands, we discuss the evolution of provenance areas and the compositional relationships of sandstones among the main geologic provinces. The Permian to Jurassic sandstones in the South Kitakami Belt, Maizuru Belt and Chichibu Composite Belt migrate from IIA (immature island arc) field through EIA (evolved island arc) field to CA (continental arc) & DA (dissected arc) field in the BI diagram with time. Considering modal compositions, the geochemical change is indicative of provenance transition from immature island arc composed mainly of andesitic to rhyolitic volcanic rocks to continental arc made up mainly of granitic and high-grade metamorphic rocks in each geologic province. This suggests that the Permian to Jurassic clastic rocks in the South Kitakami, Maizuru and Chichibu Composite Belts were supplied from the same source. Permian to Jurassic sandstones from other geologic provinces such as the Akiyoshi, Hida-Gaien, Oshima and North Kitakami Belts also support this conclusion. The source was covered by andesitic to dacitic volcanic rocks from the beginning of the Cretaceous onward. The nature of volcanism in the source during the Cretaceous changed from andesitic to rhyolitic in the Turonian-Coniacian.

publication_name.en: The Memoirs of the Geological Society of Japan.

paper_title.ja: 西九州，黒瀬川地帯の下部白亜系砂岩の組成
paper_title.en: Petrography of the Lower Cretaceous sandstones from the Kurosegawa Terrane in western Kyushu, Southwest Japan

description.ja: 西九州黒瀬川地帯の下部白亜系は, 四国の物部川層群に対比される三峰山層群と, それとは二枚貝化石相および岩相が異なる先外和泉層群に区分されている.両者の砂岩の全岩化学組成, 砕屑性ザクロ石およびクロムスピネルの化学組成を検討した結果, 1)BIダイヤグラム上での検討では全岩化学組成の時代の経過にともなう変化パターンが両者で逆であること, 2)砕屑性ザクロ石の化学組成では先外和泉層群中のものに, スペッサルティン成分に富むザクロ石が少し多いこと, 3)砕屑性クロムスピネルは先外和泉層群砂岩中にのみ多く認められ, 蛇紋岩に由来するものが多数を占めるが, プレート内玄武岩を起源とするものも少数含まれること, が判明した.三峰山層群と先外和泉層群とは砂岩組成上でも相差が明確であり, 両者は堆積環境や後背地が異なった.離れた場所で形成されたと考えられる.
description.en: The Lower Cretaceous strata of the Kurosegawa Terrane exposed in the eastern part of the Yatsushiro area is divided into the two groups, namely, the Mitsumineyama and Pre-Sotoizumi Groups on the basis of the paleontological studies. The sandstone compositions were compared between the two groups to understand the cause of this difference. The analyses were carried out for major elements as whole rock and chemical composition of detrital garnets and chromian spinels. The chemical characteristics of sandstones from the Early Cretaceous two groups were discussed on the B.I. diagram. Roughly, the sandstone compositions of the Mitsumineyama Group migrated from EIA (evolved island arc) field to CA (continental arc) & DA (dissected arc) field, while those of the Pre-Sotoizumi Group migrated from CA & DA field to IIA (immature island arc) field. Detrital garnets of the sandstones from the Mitsumineyama and Pre-Sotoizumi Groups are mostly almandine with a minor amount of Mg and Mn. Mg-rich almandine, Mn-rich almandine and grandite (grossular+andradite), with minor difference of Mn-rich almandine content between the both groups. Detrital Cr-spinels are found only in the sandstones of the Pre-Sotoizumi Group. Judging from the sandstone geochemistry, it can be concluded that there are significant differences in provenance between the Mitsumineyama and the Pre-Sotoizumi Groups.

publication_name.en: The Memoirs of the Geological Society of Japan.
